name: getEvents
description: Get a series of audit events describing changes made to your Vonage API account over time.

event_type.description: Filter results by this event type.

date_from.description: Start of time range for audit events. DateTime in ISO-8601 format.

date_to.description: End of time range for audit events. DateTime in ISO-8601 format.

search_text.description: Return only audit events where the JSON object contains this search text. Must be legal text for a JSON attribute value, that is quotes and braces must be escaped.

$ul: **_embedded**: Container containing the `events` array.
**events**
**_links**: Container containing self, next and last page links.
**last**
**href**: URI of the last document in the sequence.
**next**
**href**: URI of the next document.
**self**
**href**: URI of this document.
**page**: Page containing results.
**number**: Which page of the pagination sequence you are looking at.
**size**: The total number of items in this response (page). (default: 30)
**totalElements**: The total number of items across all pages.
**totalPages**: The number of pages of data in the response.
**error**: A human readable description of the error
**message**: A longer description of the error
**status**: The HTTP Status code of the error
**error**: A human readable description of the error
**message**: A longer description of the error
**status**: The HTTP Status code of the error
**error**: A human readable description of the error XXX
**message**: A longer description of the error YYY
**status**: The HTTP Status code of the error
